Beyond Meat is the R&D and volume leader in plant-based protein, and has the right business model to be the market share leader in this upstart category.

Plant-based meat is getting closer and closer to replicating the molecular structure of animal meat. 

It's only a matter of time before they are indistinguishable to human sensory perception.
